title: Google Patches Critical Zero-Day Flaw in Chromeâ€™s V8 Engine After Active Exploitation
description: Google has released security updates to address a vulnerability in its Chrome browser for which an exploit exists in the wild. The zero-day vulnerability, tracked as CVE-2025-6554 (CVSS score: N/A), has been described as a type confusing flaw in the V8 JavaScript and WebAssembly engine.
